programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppy Badge - Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay. He's one cute puppy, but he looks like he could cause chaos in the clubhouse. And wait a minute - what's that terrible smell?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Cardboard Box Badge - The dog gets a delivery that arrives in a big box and the squirrels discover that cardboard can be very interesting.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep38
programme.desc: The Caterpillar Badge - The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when Tag makes friends with a caterpillar. She is very hungry, so Tag feeds her the vegetable leaves they have been picking.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Great Mosque of Djenne, Africa - Grandmaster Glitch is invited to Djenne in Mali, Africa, to visit the people and to see one of his favourite things at work - mud.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Wimbledon, England - The Go Jetters are at Centre Court in Wimbledon to watch the world's most famous tennis tournament.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?

programme.title: My World Kitchen S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Sonny-Mac's Sussex Banoffi Pie - Sonny-Mac has invited his friends to dress up for a tea party where he serves banoffi pie. Thought to have been invented in Sussex, it is made using banana, biscuits, cream and dates.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Orangutans - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the rainforests of Borneo in South-East Asia in search of an orangutan mother and her baby.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep8
programme.desc: The Pirate Inspector - A mysterious Pirate Inspector is coming to visit Captain Captain and the pirates. If they fail the inspection, they will get a huge fine. But they soon suspect the Inspector is someone they know!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep9
programme.desc: The Big Day - Seaweed is excited because today is THE BIG DAY, but he's forgotten what THE BIG DAY actually is. Can Captain Captain and Sandy help him remember?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Favourite Thing - When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Dropoff - Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Tablet Takeover - The Veggies are delighted with a new tablet they've found. When they're not looking, Evil Pea turns the tablet to evil mode. Soon the tablet takes over the supermarket.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep33
programme.desc: The Tidy Up Badge - A big package arrives for Duggee while he is dusting - an amazing new vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep34
programme.desc: The Circus Badge - The Squirrels are excited that a circus has come to town, until they see it is a flea circus. However, they realise it is impressive when they see the acts.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep35
programme.desc: The Egg Badge - A newly laid egg has trouble hatching and runs off with just its legs poking out, so the squirrels set off to bring it back safely.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Kinderdijk, Netherlands - The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Liquid and Solid - Kit and Pup are at the park. What can you see that's liquid and what can you see that's solid? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator explore the difference between honey and water.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Raspberry - Dee encourages a friend to say 'raspberry' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today is all about raspberries - we see a red raspberry, a small raspberry, a fancy hat raspberry and a high raspberry.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep72
programme.desc: Teddy Bear - Po finds a teddy bear in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, LaaLaa and Po excitedly show the teddy to the Tiddlytubbies and they all love it very much.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Best Friend Song - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing the Best Friend Song with their school friends.

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep25
programme.desc: The Forgotten Tunnel - Granny, Tiny and Small go on a trip that leads them to a forgotten tunnel. They are fascinated by the things they find there, and by the strange sounds they can hear.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep28
programme.desc: The Thing That Rescued Us - Gwen, Bob and Tony bounce very high from some mushrooms and get stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Twisty Turny - When HQ gets twisted up, tensions are stretched tight to fix the problem.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep53
programme.desc: Hill Stop - When a Po can't drive his little car over a big hill, the Team downsize the problem.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep57

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep58
programme.desc: Same Old Story - Monty wonders whether tales must always stay the same, or if the endings can sometimes be different. He ponders this as his grandmother reads him a story.

programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep204
programme.desc: Mutiny on the Krusty / The Whole Tooth - When a storm sweeps the Krusty Krab away, its crew and customers will need a crazed Krabs to lead them back home. // Patricks last baby tooth needs to come out, but hes afraid to let it go.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep205
programme.desc: Whirlybrains / MermaidPants - SpongeBob and Patrick get hooked on the latest fad - flying your own brain like a tiny drone! // When SpongeBob & Patrick play Mermaidman and Barnacleboy, it's all fun and games until their sworn enemies arrive!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Snooze You Lose - Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition!

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep121
programme.desc: What Dwells Within - The Malto kids are lost in an underground maze of tunnels with a mysterious monster stalking them. To survive, they must team up with Starscream! But can they trust him?

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell - Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Funny Mommy / Smurfy Day Care - Jokey transforms Poet into Gargamel's Mom, but they find themselves trapped in Gargamel's hovel. // Storm has to become a super smurfsitter when all of the Smurfs turn back into babies.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Smurfy Secrets - When Gargamel tries to transform into a Smurf, the Smurfs have to share their secrets to prove their identity.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep170
programme.desc: Free Samples / Home Sweet Rubble - After Plankton drives away Mr. Krabs' customers, Mr. Krabs is forced to give out free Krabby Patties to try to win them back. // SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and he needs all of his friends to help him remodel it!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep191
programme.desc: Squid Plus One / The Executive Treatment - After receiving an invitation to a gallery opening, Squidward scrambles to find a friend to take with him. // While trying to order a special sandwich, Patrick gets swept up in the fast paced world of business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep192
programme.desc: Company Picnic / Pull Up a Barrel - Mr. Krabs throws a company picnic to boost morale, but Plankton is hosting his own on the same day! // Mr. Krabs regales SpongeBob with tales from his old Navy days.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Maxed Out - Hector finds out Vito has a huge tab at the mercado and Vito offers to pay him back - no matter what!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Tiny Toddler / Magical Beefery Tour - After misplacing the shrink ray Captain Man & Kid Danger have to battle The Toddler to win it back. // When Captain Man & Kid Danger find a golden pickle in their burger they win a private tour of the secretive factory where Beefo's Burgers are made.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Night Patty - SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Fire Safety / Castle Catastrophe - When the girls at school develop a crush on the Fire Marshall, Alvin decides to be a hero with disastrous results. // After causing an accident at a historic castle, Cheesy and Alvin must work as reenactors to pay for the damage.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Party Animals / Warren Seville - Alvin books the band at a birthday party only to discover they've been booked for the petting zoo, as the pets! // When Alvin tries to break Theodore's dependence on Talking Teddy, Theodore invents a new imaginary friend.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep104
programme.desc: New Friend, Old Enemy - To prove that Turtles can be friends with humans, Michelangelo uses a social networking site to befriend Chris Bradford, a famous martial artist who is secretly Shredders top lieutenant.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Anti-Poof - For every fairy, there's an anti-fairy - thus anti-Poof is born - FOOP! It's up to Poof to stop this anti-fairy from destroying Fairy World and his loved ones.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Ice Ice Baby - After getting caught in a snowstorm, Evan accidentally damages the snow ogre meant to protect local villagers and is made to stand trial for his crime.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Dorg and the Magicals - As the Magicals track down an alien substance for RD, General Gratch and his scientists arrive in Normill, also on the hunt for something magical... // Time is running out for Dorg and the Magicals to find the rare Numpty Newt!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Festa Perrfeita / O Novato Anbis - Felicity worries that her powers won't measure up at a party for the most powerful and popular citizens in Mythlandia. // An ancient Anubis king tests Miguel to see if he's ready to leave Mythlandia and become the next ruler.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Hot Sauce Boss / Ghost Pool - When Chicken Chuck adds his own sauce to Pennys hot wings, a heated competition erupts between the longtime friends. // The kids go on a quest to find a legendary pool in the forest.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Galloping Ghost / Bluehoof's Treasure - When Ferris believes he is being haunted, it's up to the Corn and Peg to prove that ghosts aren't real. Or are they. // Corn, Peg, and Ferris set sail on a swashbuckling adventure to bring a missing piece of history back to Galloping Grove.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Eyes on the Prize / Battle of the Stands - Fanboy and Chum Chum desperately want to find a rare cereal box toy. So they go to Oz for guidance and training. // Fanboy and Chum Chum start a lemonade stand, but soon realize Lupe and Yo have a stand of their own... right across the street!

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Snapnapped / Mom-A-Geddon - Keswick is convinced by Snaptrap to build D.O.O.M. a new doomsday device, after he starts feeling that T.U.F.F. can't show empathy. // Dudley hasn't told his overprotective mother, Peg Puppy, that he is a T.U.F.F. super spy.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Rusty's Mechanical Animal / Rusty's Spaceship - Rusty and Ruby make Ranger Anna a robotic pet, but it goes haywire when they try to program it. // Rusty builds Liam a spaceship as a surprise, but instead of impressing him, it wreaks havoc on the town.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Explorers Club - Wally and Ogre Doug start a club for explorers and set out to find the rare Chickephant. But trouble brews when Bobgoblin starts a rival club with Hattie the Witch.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Catlantic City / Scaredy Cat - Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. // Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Krusty Katering - Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 4 - North Melbourne Tasmania v Brisbane Lions Ep19
programme.desc: The North Melbourne Tasmanian Kangaroos host the Brisbane Lions in Launceston, Tasmania as Round 4 of the AFLW season continues.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 4 - St Kilda v Collingwood Ep20
programme.desc: The St Kilda Saints take on the Collingwood Magpies in Round 4 of the AFLW.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep33
programme.desc: Gardening Australia

programme.title: Compass - Death and the Poet Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - When beloved Australian poet Robert Adamson was diagnosed with terminal cancer, Compass was invited into his home to share his final weeks of creating a "good death" with family and lifelong friends.

programme.title: Voices Of Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan looks at Victoria's First People's Assembly and the progress on a Treaty. Tahnee Jash unpacks NZ's long standing Waitangi Treaty. We look at the importance of culture and how that means different things.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep77
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: First Weapons - Amerr Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Host Phil Breslin observes senior weapon makers as they craft the Amerr. Experts reveal the scientific principles, followed by a challenge of speed and skill highlighting how the weapon was once one of the fastest on earth.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Stoned Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - When King Charles III has his Coronation, will he sit on a potent and sacred symbol of the Scottish people? Marc Fennell investigates a wild Scottish heist to steal back an object - quite literally - from the British throne.

programme.title: Australia's Vietnam War Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As the US withdraws from Vietnam, Australia follows suit. For those who returned, the war would forever hang over their lives, through health issues like PTSD. Members of the Vietnamese diaspora speak. (Final)

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Treasures - Ancient Forests Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Daintree Rainforest has one of the highest rates of biodiversity on Earth. Aaron Pedersen explains how this oldest rainforest on Earth is a window into an Australia that has otherwise vanished.

programme.title: Compass - Death and the Poet Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - When beloved Australian poet Robert Adamson was diagnosed with terminal cancer, Compass was invited into his home to share his final weeks of creating a "good death" with family and lifelong friends.

programme.title: Art Works - Mithu Sen, Classics for Kids, Bandura Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Indian artist Mithu Sen brings mOTHERTONGUE to ACCA in Melbourne. ABC Classic shares lesser-known music for kids, we meet Dr Kirsten Lyttle to learn about her multimedia art practice and hear from a master of the Bandura.

programme.title: Voices Of Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Bridget Brennan looks at Victoria's First People's Assembly and the progress on a Treaty. Tahnee Jash unpacks NZ's long standing Waitangi Treaty. We look at the importance of culture and how that means different things.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep77
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Landline Ep33
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep77

programme.title: Small Journeys
programme.desc: The villagers of Kawauchi were forced to evacuate after the nuclear disaster of 2011, but they are gradually recovering their way of life, united by the blessings of the village's pristine streams.

programme.title: Bosai: Landslides

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC279DiazvsFerguson
programme.desc: UFC 279 was headlined by a bout between two UFC legends and Ultimate Fighter winners: Nate Diaz and Tony El Cucuy Ferguson. Plus, Khamzat Chimaev faced rival Kevin Holland. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep19
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep8
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.
